channel.title: Blues Mesa does not work correctly
channel.description: Russian subtitles do not work - hieroglyphs. There is no sound in the game, except the voice of the long proposals of scientists. The console has a lot of red text about errors and corrupted files. :frowning: Please, help! :frowning:

item.title: Blues Mesa does not work correctly
item.dc:creator: Albus
item.description:
Я решил эту проблему - отписался от контента из мастерской (был подписан на несколько карт и замену звуковых файлов с моделями) и все заработало!
I solved this problem - unsubscribed from the content from the workshop (and was subscribed to several cards and replaced the sound files with the models) and it all worked!

Read full topic
item.source: Blues Mesa does not work correctly

item.title: Blues Mesa does not work correctly

item.description:
verify integrity of game cache, reinstalling the game, reinstalling the steam - did not help.

item.source: Blues Mesa does not work correctly

item.title: Blues Mesa does not work correctly
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
Try right-clicking on Black Mesa’s entry in the Steam Library, selecting “properties”, and under the “local files” tab clicking “verify integrity of game cache”.

Read full topic
